summary: REQ-11 and REQ-12 appear implemented via a timeout-based, non-blocking auth initialization flow in App.tsx plus a new dismissible status banner component. REQ-10 (removal of a nested React Query provider / ensuring a single QueryClientProvider instance) is not evidenced in the provided diff summary.

missing_requirements.requirement: Remove the nested React Query provider so the app uses a single QueryClientProvider (the one already wrapping the app in frontend/src/main.tsx), and ensure all hooks/components use that single provider instance.
missing_requirements.reason: The diff summary shows changes focused on auth initialization timeout/error UI (App.tsx + new banner component) but contains no evidence of removing a nested QueryClientProvider or refactoring React Query provider usage. No QueryClientProvider-related changes are shown.
